userStories.title: Daily Digest - View today's meals
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see today's meals with quick actions so that I can act quickly on my plan.
acceptanceCriteria: Displays Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner with image, name, and actions
Includes "Swap Meal" and "Cook Now" actions on each card
Mobile-first layout with vertical scrolling

userStories.title: Swap a planned meal
userStories.description: As a user, I want to swap a planned meal so that I can replace it with a suggested alternative.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking "Swap Meal" shows suggested alternatives
Selecting an alternative updates the plan for that meal and date
Shopping list is updated accordingly

userStories.title: Cook Now from Daily Digest
userStories.description: As a user, I want to start cooking a planned meal so that I can access the recipe quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: "Cook Now" navigates to the recipe details page
Preserves navigation state to return to Daily Digest

userStories.title: Weekly plan view (desktop)
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a weekly plan grid so that I can review and edit my week at a glance.
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop shows a table Day Ã— (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner)
Meal names are clickable to open details
Supports quick replace/edit from the grid

userStories.title: Desktop quick actions
userStories.description: As a user, I want quick actions (Add Recipe, Create Plan, Generate List) so that I can perform frequent tasks faster.
acceptanceCriteria: Visible in the desktop sidebar
Each action triggers the corresponding flow

userStories.title: Discover recipes with search and filters
userStories.description: As a user, I want to search and filter recipes so that I can find suitable options.
acceptanceCriteria: Search bar filters by title/description
Multi-select filter chips (e.g., Quick & Easy, Vegetarian, Gluten-Free)
Results update in real-time

userStories.title: View recipe details
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view a recipe's details so that I can decide to cook or plan it.
acceptanceCriteria: Shows title, image, description, ingredients, and steps
Displays tags and meal type
Action to add to a specific day/meal slot

userStories.title: Generate shopping list from meal plan
userStories.description: As a user, I want to generate a shopping list so that I can buy what I need for my planned meals.
acceptanceCriteria: Generates categorized items from the current meal plan
Groups by Produce, Dairy, Meat, Pantry
Deduplicates and sums quantities when possible

userStories.title: Manage shopping list items
userStories.description: As a user, I want to manage shopping list items so that I can track purchases and modify the list.
acceptanceCriteria: Check/uncheck items with visual feedback
Add custom items (quantity, unit, name)
Remove items and print the list

userStories.title: Set dietary preferences and allergies
userStories.description: As a user, I want to set my dietary preferences and allergies so that recommendations match my needs.
acceptanceCriteria: Single-select dietary preference (e.g., Vegetarian, Keto)
Multi-select allergies (e.g., gluten, nuts, dairy)
Preferences affect recipe suggestions and planning

userStories.title: Configure meal plan options
userStories.description: As a user, I want to configure meals per day, plan length, leftovers, and excluded ingredients so that my plan fits my routine.
acceptanceCriteria: Select 2/3/4 meals per day
Set plan length (1 or 2 weeks)
Toggle leftovers and auto-generate shopping list
Exclude ingredients from suggestions

userStories.title: Auto-sync shopping list on plan changes
userStories.description: As a user, I want my shopping list to update automatically when I change the plan so that it remains accurate.
acceptanceCriteria: Any plan change reflects in the shopping list
Badge/notice indicates updates applied
